document_data.name: Smelling Salts
document_data.mainbody: '''Smelling salts''' were overwhelmingly pungent [[ammonia]] crystals valued for their mind-waking power.
document_data.Availability:
Smelling salts were among the minor [[herb]]al and alchemical medicinal products created by [[alchemist]]s, [[apothecaries]], and [[hedge wizard]]s.{{Cite dragon/163/Hedge Wizards|24}}

The salts could be obtained from [[deer]] [[antler]]s via an alchemical process that concentrated the ammonia.
